description:
No. 8 picked up both the Wood Cubes at the end of Dolph`s failed coup-de-etat, but tipped them out of the window of the airship when smoking a cigarette.
In the aftermath of the princess entertainment competition, he also tosses out his blue cheerleader pom-poms.
He is thus, in http://anidb.net/ch25914 [Yukko]`s mind, responsible for http://anidb.net/ch25916 [Mio]`s hairstyle in its entirety.
name: Heishi 8-ban
